name: @syncnapse/root
description: SyncNapse monorepo (frontend: Next.js, backend: Nest.js, infra helpers)

scripts.build: bun run --cwd backend build && bun run --cwd frontend build
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=dev concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c blue,green "bun run --cwd frontend dev" "bun run --cwd backend start:dev"
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd frontend lint && bun run --cwd backend lint
scripts.format: bun run --cwd frontend format && bun run --cwd backend format
scripts.test: bun run --cwd frontend test && bun run --cwd backend test
scripts.test:ci: bun run --cwd frontend test:ci && bun run --cwd backend test:ci
scripts.clean: bun run dev:down && rm -rf node_modules data frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/.next backend/dist .env .env.dev .env.prod backend/.env .env-repo && echo '✅ Cleaned: node_modules, dist, .env files, .env-repo'
scripts.clean:force: bun run dev:down && sudo rm -rf node_modules data frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/.next backend/dist .env .env.dev .env.prod backend/.env .env-repo && echo '✅ Force cleaned with sudo'
scripts.setup: bun install --ignore-scripts && cd backend && bun install --ignore-scripts && cd ../frontend && bun install --ignore-scripts && cd .. && bun run --cwd backend prisma:generate && bun run env:sync && ENV_TARGET=dev bun scripts/sync-envs.mjs
scripts.setup:full: bun run setup && bun run dev:all
scripts.dev:all: docker compose --env-file .env.dev -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.minio.yml up -d --build
scripts.dev:down: docker compose --env-file .env.dev -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.minio.yml down
scripts.dev:restart: bun run dev:down && bun run dev:all
scripts.dev:logs: docker compose --env-file .env.dev -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.minio.yml logs -f
